clustering.sfcm
Interface ClusteringDelegate

All Known Implementing Classes:
SFCMManager
public interface ClusteringDelegate

Interface which must be implemented by a delegate class that will be asked to use the ImageJ api in order to update the status of the clustering algorithm (SFCM). ie the delegating actor.

See Also:
SFCM, SFCMManager

Method Summary
 void updateStatus(float[][] V, int[][] U, long nIteration, float error)
          Provides a way to communicate the current status of the clustering algorithm via the current values in the cluster center matrix, cluster membership matrix, current iteration and error from the previous iteration

Method Detail

updateStatus

void updateStatus(float[][] V,
                  int[][] U,
                  long nIteration,
                  float error)
Provides a way to communicate the current status of the clustering algorithm via the current values in the cluster center matrix, cluster membership matrix, current iteration and error from the previous iteration

Parameters:
V - the cluster center matrix
U - the cluster membership matrix
nIteration - the current iteration number
error - the current iteration error

updateStatus

void updateStatus(java.lang.String message)
Provides a way to communicate the current status of the clustering algorithm via a message

Parameters:
message - a string containing a message describing the current status

updateStatus

void updateStatus(float[][] V,
                  int[][] U,
                  long nIteration,
                  float errorJ,
                  float errorU,
                  float errorV)
                  throws java.io.IOException
Provides a way to communicate the current status of the clustering algorithm via a more detailed view on its current iteration internal variable. It is used when testing. It tries to write to file

Parameters:
V - the cluster center matrix
U - the cluster memebership matrix
nIteration - the current iteration
errorJ - the current iteration error of the objective function
errorU - the current iteration error of the memebership matrix
errorV - the current iterration error of the cluster center matrix
Throws:
java.io.IOException - exception cause by trying to write to file
See Also:
TestManager
